# This file was generated by
# scripts/copy_from_upstream/copy_from_upstream.py

set(_KAZ_SIGN_OBJS "")

if(OQS_ENABLE_SIG_KAZ_SIGN)
  add_library(kaz_sign OBJECT api.c kaz_api.c  sha256.c sig_kaz_sign.c)
  target_include_directories(kaz_sign PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})
  target_include_directories(kaz_sign PRIVATE ${OPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR})
  target_link_libraries(kaz_sign PRIVATE gmp)

  set(_KAZ_SIGN_OBJS ${_KAZ_SIGN_OBJS} $<TARGET_OBJECTS:kaz_sign>)
endif()

set(KAZ_SIGN_OBJS ${_KAZ_SIGN_OBJS} PARENT_SCOPE)
